alpha.title: Tweeten Alpha 10
alpha.description:
Hi everyone,

Today we are releasing Build 10 to testers in the alpha update channel.

The update includes new improvements.

Here's what's new:

  • Lots and lots of bug fixes

beta.title: Tweeten Beta 1.4.2
beta.description:
Hi everyone,

Today we are releasing Beta 1.4.2 to testers in the beta update channel. This update introduces some improvements and bug fixes.

Here's what's new and improvements:

  • Say hello to our new logo!
  • Added the ability to close Detailed view with Esc key
  • Fixed a critical bug which caused the app to crash on Reload
